scenes.description: You stand in a glowing arena floating in space, surrounded by cheering cosmic beings.

templates.happy: The cheers feel like music, and the stardust under your feet sparkles in rhythm with your enthusiasm.
templates.sad: Even if you started out feeling low, the bright colors and kind faces in the crowd begin to pull you upward.
templates.angry: The roar of the arena gives your energy somewhere bold and bright to go instead of boiling inside you.
templates.disgust: The air here feels sharp and clean, the stardust bright and orderly, leaving little room for messy thoughts.
templates.fear: The arena looks huge, but a friendly glowing spirit floats to your side, promising to guide you through every step.
templates.surprised: You had not expected to become the center of a cosmic tournament, yet here you are, lit by a thousand distant stars.
templates.neutral: You notice the patterns of light, the strange banners and the quiet hum of energy under the arena floor.

scenes.description: A track of floating platforms appears, glowing with shifting starlight.

templates.happy: You leap from platform to platform with laughter in your chest, the stars rushing by in a joyful blur.
templates.sad: Each jump feels like a small, personal victory, and the crowd's warm cheers gently lift your spirits.
templates.angry: You hurl yourself forward with fierce determination, turning your sharp energy into focused movement.
templates.disgust: The clear lines of the platforms and the crisp air make the path feel pure, giving you something simple and clean to follow.
templates.fear: A guiding light marks the safest platforms, and you realize you do not have to jump the farthest to succeed.
templates.surprised: You are surprised at how quickly you adapt, your body finding a rhythm with the pulsing starlight.
templates.neutral: You move at a steady pace, learning how each platform responds under your feet as you go.

options.text: Make one final leap to the finish ring.
Slow down and enjoy the view before finishing.

scenes.description: A cluster of glowing symbols spins slowly in the air before you.

templates.happy: The puzzle feels like a fun game, and each symbol that clicks into place sends a little burst of satisfaction through you.
templates.sad: The clear rules and gentle ticking of the symbols are comforting; for once, the world makes sense if you just keep trying.
templates.angry: You pour your intensity into studying the symbols, breaking the problem apart with sharp focus instead of frustration.
templates.disgust: The puzzle's structure is neat and elegant, a welcome contrast to anything that felt messy or wrong earlier.
templates.fear: A soft voice from a nearby star spirit gives you hints, reminding you that you do not have to solve everything alone.
templates.surprised: You did not expect to enjoy thinking this hard, yet each small discovery feels exciting.
templates.neutral: You calmly test patterns and combinations, watching how the symbols respond.

options.text: Place the last symbol into the center.
Ask the arena spirit for one more hint.

scenes.description: For a moment, the arena slows, and you can see the whole galaxy spread out around you.

templates.happy: The view is breathtaking, a huge cosmic celebration that matches your bright mood.
templates.sad: The stars make your problems feel a little smaller, and the gentle glow around you feels like a quiet hug.
templates.angry: The vastness of space takes the edge off your feelings, reminding you there is room for everything to soften.
templates.disgust: Out here, nothing is cluttered or cramped; the galaxy looks clean and balanced, and you breathe a bit easier.
templates.fear: Surrounded by so many lights, you no longer feel alone. Each tiny star feels like a small, distant friend.
templates.surprised: You had not realized how far you had come, standing in the center of all this starlight.
templates.neutral: You stand quietly, observing the calm motion of distant planets and drifting comets.

options.text: Return to the arena floor to hear the results.

scenes.description: The crowd gathers as a beam of light crowns you with stardust.

templates.happy: You feel like a hero of a bright, impossible story, the arena echoing your joy back to you.
templates.sad: The applause does not erase everything, but it gives you a clear moment of pride you can carry with you.
templates.angry: You stand strong and calm, your energy now steady, knowing you faced the trials and turned your force into skill.
templates.disgust: The ceremony feels pure and simple: you tried, you adapted, and now you are being thanked by the stars themselves.
templates.fear: It turns out the arena was never here to judge you harshly; it just wanted to show you how capable you already are.
templates.surprised: You are surprised at how natural the stardust crown feels, as if a part of you always belonged up here.
templates.neutral: You accept the glow of the stardust crown quietly, noting the gentle warmth on your head and shoulders.
